com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class ScanOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ScanOptions

  • public final class ScanOptions
extends Object
    Class used to feed options for scanning via BleManager.startScan(ScanOptions).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScanOptions() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScanOptions

        public ScanOptions()

    • Method Detail

      • scanFor

        public final ScanOptions scanFor(Interval time)
        Scan for the specified amount of time. This method implies a one-time scan. If you want to perform a periodic scan, then use scanPeriodically(Interval, Interval) instead.

      • scanPeriodically

        public final ScanOptions scanPeriodically(Interval scanTime,
                                          Interval pauseTime)
        Do a periodic scan. If you want to do a one-time scan, then use scanFor(Interval) instead.

      • withScanFilter

        public final ScanOptions withScanFilter(BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter filter)
        Set a BleManagerConfig.ScanFilter for this scan.

      • withDiscoveryListener

        public final ScanOptions withDiscoveryListener(BleManager.DiscoveryListener listener)
        Set a BleManager.DiscoveryListener for this scan.

      • asHighPriority

        public final ScanOptions asHighPriority(boolean highPriority)
        This will set the scan to be of the highest priority. This should ONLY be used if you absolutely need it! With this active, ONLY scanning will happen (even if you call connect on a device, or read/write, etc), until you call BleManager.stopScan() or BleManager.stopPeriodicScan().
